docs.lead_paragraph: Updated, July 23, 8:50 a.m. | President Obama in a news conference last night accused the Cambridge police of acting "stupidly" in arresting Henry Louis Gates Jr. at his home last week.

headline.main: The Gates Case and Racial Profiling

docs.abstract: Have we made progress in reducing racial profiling? What more might be done?
docs.snippet: Have we made progress in reducing racial profiling? What more might be done?

docs.lead_paragraph: Oncology nurse Theresa Brown is a regular contributor to Well.
docs.abstract: For nurses, there are good days and bad days. And as nurse Theresa Brown writes, sometimes there are very bad days.
docs.snippet: For nurses, there are good days and bad days. And as nurse Theresa Brown writes, sometimes there are very bad days.
